entry.def: Malay means belonging or relating to the people, language, or culture of the largest racial group in Malaysia.
A Malay is a member of the largest racial group in Malaysia.

example.ex: ...the three main racial groups in Malaysia — the Malays, the Indians and the Chinese.
example.tran: 马来西亚的三大种族——马来人、印度人、华人

entry.def: Malay is a language that is spoken in Malaysia and in parts of Indonesia.

means.word_mean: 1. a member of a people inhabiting the northern Malay Peninsula and Malaysia and parts of the western Malay Archipelago
2. a western subfamily of Western Malayo-Polynesian languages
1. of or relating to or characteristic of the people or language of Malaysia and the northern Malay Peninsula and parts of the western Malay Archipelago;
